Question
========
If you cannot find Positron-specific guidance, what is a good fallback?

Answerlist
----------
* Search for the equivalent VS Code tip and try it in Positron
* Assume the feature does not exist
* Reinstall Positron from scratch
* Avoid using Positron until dedicated docs appear

Solution
========
Because Positron is based on VS Code, solutions for VS Code often work and are worth trying.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
